text: Motion
…For the next live performance?

Yeah, we want to convey Amana and
the others' feelings to everyone.

...I understand that there are various thoughts
about the "Kindness Awareness Month".

Some people may get hurt
by the word "kindness"…
That might be true.

But Amana and the others want to believe...
that kindness has the power to cheer people up.

...Just saying it might not
get through to everyone...

But...
Amana and the others have songs...!

I believe we can deliver those
feelings through our songs!
Motion
...I see.
Producer-san...

...Got it.
I'll leave the MC's content to everyone.
Thank you, Producer-san.
However...

The audience coming to the live performance
are mostly fans of ALSTROEMERIA.
Motion

For those people...
I think it'll be easier to convey everyone's feelings.

But there are also people in the world who are not like that...
People who are skeptical about the word "kindness".
Motion

I think it's difficult to reach those people,
but I'd be happy if they could do their best.
...Yeah!
